}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This revision may be known as the ZEW1000P and ZEW1000PU. *[https://deviwiki.com/files/vendors/Zonet/zew1000P.zip Drivers (labeled zew1000P.zip)] *[https://deviwiki.com/files/vendors/Zonet/zew1000PU.zip Drivers (labeled zew1000PU.zip)]
[http://lists.debian.org/debian-laptop/2003/08/msg00075.html PCMCIA device string dump] :<small>product info: "ATMEL", "AT76C502AR_D"</small> :<small>function: 6 (network)</small>
This device shares the same appearance and device ID as the [[PESI WP221P-X]]. It is assumed to be the same device.
